events.message: I was involved in a car collision yesterday afternoon and need to file a claim for the damages to my vehicle.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the insured vehicle in a collision.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist you through the claims process and gather all necessary information.
Your claim for the car accident has been received and acknowledged. We will begin processing it shortly.
We kindly request you to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, the police report, and your driverâ€™s license for verification.
The requested documents including accident photos and police report have been uploaded successfully to your claim profile.
An investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision has officially commenced as per company procedures.
The investigation report has been finalized confirming the fault and extent of damage sustained in the car accident.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on repair costs and policy limits to resolve your auto accident claim promptly.
We have received your feedback regarding the settlement proposal and noted your willingness to accept the terms.
Your claim has been approved and is now ready for payment issuance as per the agreed settlement amount.
The payment covering repair costs has been successfully transferred to your designated bank account.
Your claim has been officially closed after completing all necessary financial transactions and communications.
The case files and all associated documentation have been archived for future reference according to company policy.
